alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 3:30AM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, except 1 to 2 feet on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sawtooth/Stanley Basin, Sun Valley Region, and Wood River Foothills, including but not limited to Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, Hailey, Bellevue, and Picabo. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow squalls will be possible late Tuesday morning into Tuesday afternoon leading to near whiteout to whiteout conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
